JobTitle: Senior Manager, Global Distribution Digital Solutions - Investment Product Data Display
JobFullDesc: A career at T. Rowe Price says you want to contribute and make a difference at a leading global investment management firm where success results from the dedication our associates have in building success for our clients. We are a growing organization of associates from diverse backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.We take a long-term view on associates and their careers. Our associates do phenomenal work with purpose, and as a result, we provide growth opportunities through in-person and online training, management development programs, and career development on the job.If you are seeking a meaningful work experience along with a workplace culture that thrives on teamwork, we invite you to explore the opportunity to join us.The Senior Manager, Global Distribution Digital Solutions, for Investment Product Data Display, is accountable for developing a global multi-year strategic vision and roadmap, for the establishment of a consistent and global approach to managing the successful delivery of the desired digital client experience for the full range of our investment products data. The success of the capability delivery will involve a balance between the establishment of an ideal client experience, whilst delivering enterprise wide operating efficiencies in the effective delivery of the investment product data to our clients, through all our segment websites.The Senior Manager will be accountable for leading and building out a group of subject matter experts (whether direct reports or partnering with associates on other teams) who have a deep understanding of our investment products, the respective client needs across all segments and regions, combined with a good comprehension of the relevant regulatory and compliance requirements. Working across all regions and all investment products and vehicle types (including all 40 Act, SICAV, AUT, OEIC and ITM products), the Senior Manager will lead the team to translate the vision into a roadmap of change initiatives and continuous improvement, that deliver towards achieving the desired client experience. Working across the full lifecycle of investment product from pre-launch to closure, they will work across a broad range of stakeholders and partners, including business unit stakeholders, individual digital delivery teams, data owners and investment product teams, to drive the successful implementation of the roadmap. Success for this role will be visible through measurable improvements in the speed, accuracy and efficiencies of the delivery of the investment product data to the websites and greater consistencies globally in the approach and display of our investment product data display on the client websites.Adopting service design and process re-engineering practices, they will develop and roll out a consistent set of enterprise operating practices, that enable the partners and delivery teams to implement the optimal client experience, driving an increase in speed to market, high quality, and consistently accurate product data displays.As part of the vision delivery they will work with the Global Digital Design and the Technology teams to establish the creation of a common set of re-usable product data display standards. Whilst ensuring any flexibility needed is understood, validated and built into the standards to accommodate specific segment needs. The result will be a consistent visual display pattern for the investment product, leveraged across all segments, with a common operating practice.Forming part of the Digital Solutions leadership team, they will play a key role in transforming our company’s digital capability, by driving best practices across the firm for the digital display of our investment products. Leading and managing the portfolio Product Owners, the Senior Manager will be primarily responsible for leading the team to define and achieve the successful creation and delivery of a capability roadmap and change management plan, and communicating this to senior stakeholders and delivery teams.
